content: around strip with 3 single_crochet n each corner joining with a slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet and finish off repeat with 2nd strip weave in ends tip excluding the 3 single_crochet in each corner there should be 12 single_crochet along the long side of the single_crochet patches a and 24 single_crochet along the long side of the double_crochet patches there should be 2 single_crochet per post of the double_crochet s b 4 midknightstarr webs com idknightstarr wordpress com midknightstarr@gmail com copyright 2007-2014 5
